hero.title: VideoSOS
hero.subtitle: AI Video Editor
hero.description: A powerful, open-source AI video editor built for creators. Create stunning videos with our intuitive tools and 100+ AI models.

features.title: Powerful features for modern creators
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create professional-quality videos, available to everyone.

dualAI.title: Dual AI Provider Support
dualAI.description: Access 100+ state-of-the-art AI models through fal.ai and Runware.ai. Generate images with FLUX and Ideogram V3, create videos with Veo 3 and Kling, compose music with Stable Audio, and produce natural voiceovers. Switch between providers seamlessly or use both simultaneously for maximum flexibility.

privacy.title: 100% Privacy-First Architecture
privacy.description: Everything runs locally in your browser. Your projects, media, and API keys are stored in IndexedDB on your device. No uploads, no tracking, no data collection.

timeline.title: Timeline Editor
timeline.description: Advanced multi-track video editing with drag-and-drop functionality, precise keyframe control, audio waveform visualization, and real-time preview. Support for multiple aspect ratios (16:9, 9:16, 1:1) perfect for social media platforms.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Content Generation
multiModal.description: Create complete video projects with AI-generated images, videos, background music, and voiceovers. Advanced features include camera movement controls, video upscaling with Topaz, and automatic lip-sync for voiceovers.

clientSide.title: Client-Side Video Processing
clientSide.description: Powered by FFmpeg.wasm and Remotion for high-quality video rendering entirely in the browser. No server uploads, no waiting in queues. Export videos with proper audio mixing and precise timing control.

international.title: International & Accessible
international.description: Full internationalization support (English/Russian) with keyboard shortcuts for power users. Intuitive UI designed for both beginners and professionals.

costTracking.title: Cost Tracking & Project Statistics
costTracking.description: Built-in cost tracking and comprehensive project analytics help you stay within budget. Track generation costs per media item, view total project expenses, and get detailed breakdowns by media type, AI provider, and model usage.

modelSelection.title: Advanced Model Selection
modelSelection.description: Enhanced model selection interface with intelligent search, filtering by provider (FAL/Runware), and categorization by type. Real-time pricing display for FAL models helps you make informed decisions before generating content.

community.title: Join our community
community.description: VideoSOS is an open-source project. Star us on GitHub and contribute to help shape the future of AI-powered video editing.

footer.tagline: Open-source AI video editor built for creators.

metadata.title: VideoSOS | AI Video Editor
metadata.description: Open-source AI video editor that runs entirely in your browser.

leftPanel.emptyMessage: Create your image, audio and voiceover collection to compose your videos

projectDialog.title: New Project
projectDialog.description: Create a new or open an existent project
projectDialog.generateTooltip: Out of ideas? Generate a new random project.

keyDialog.title: API Keys
keyDialog.privacyNotice: We don't store your keys on our servers. Everything stays in your browser.
keyDialog.footerText: Get your FAL Key from <falLink>fal.ai</falLink> and Runware Key from <runwareLink>runware.ai</runwareLink>.

exportDialog.title: Export video
exportDialog.description: This may take a while, sit back and relax.

mediaGallery.title: Media Gallery
mediaGallery.description: The b-roll for your video composition

toast.enhancePromptFailedDesc: There was an unexpected error. Try again.
toast.generateMediaFailedDesc: Please ensure you've set your FAL API key in the settings (click the gear icon).
toast.generateMediaFailedDescRunware: Please ensure you've set your Runware API key in the settings (click the gear icon).
toast.falKeyRequiredDesc: Add your FAL API key in Settings (gear icon) to use this model.
toast.runwareKeyRequiredDesc: Add your Runware API key in Settings (gear icon) to use this model.
toast.suggestionFailedDesc: There was an unexpected error while generating a suggestion. Try again.

fluxKontext.label: FLUX.1 Kontext [pro]
fluxKontext.description: Professional image generation with context-aware editing capabilities

fluxDev.label: FLUX.1 [dev]
fluxDev.description: High-quality image generation model optimized for creative workflows

ideogramV3Text.label: Ideogram V3 (Text)
ideogramV3Text.description: Advanced text-to-image model with superior text rendering capabilities

ideogramV3Image.label: Ideogram V3 (Image)
ideogramV3Image.description: Image-to-image transformation with text rendering excellence

nanoBanana.label: Nano Banana
nanoBanana.description: Fast image editing with mask support

sd35Large.label: Stable Diffusion 3.5 Large
sd35Large.description: Latest Stable Diffusion with enhanced quality and control

veo3FastText.label: Veo 3 Fast (Text)
veo3FastText.description: Ultra-fast text-to-video generation with high quality

kling25Text.label: Kling 2.5 Turbo Pro (Text)
kling25Text.description: Top-tier text-to-video generation with unparalleled motion fluidity

kling25Image.label: Kling 2.5 Turbo Pro (Image)
kling25Image.description: Top-tier image-to-video generation with cinematic visuals

lumaDream.label: Luma Dream Machine
lumaDream.description: High quality video generation with Ray2 and Flash modes

stableAudio.label: Stable Audio
stableAudio.description: Generate high-quality audio from text prompts
